DOC.brief_summary: Pharmacokinetic (PK) study to characterize changes in serum concentrations in epilepsy patients when switching from LAMICTAL immediate-release to extended-release and vice versa.
DOC.brief_title: Patients With Epilepsy Taking LAMICTAL Immediate-Release Who Switch To Extended-Release Formulation And Vice Versa
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Confident diagnosis of epilepsy. Currently on LAMICTAL and up to 2 concomitant AEDs (antiepileptic drugs). Females of childbearing potential cannot be on hormonal contraceptives or hormone replacement therapy.
